cast.name: 阿比盖尔·霍普金斯 Abigail Hopkins

introduction: Unchained is the story of a mother who not mentally well inherits her old auntie's house. Her fragility leads to her husband and doctors questioning her ability to care for two girls. Determined to keep them she adheres to her strict religious beliefs and hides them in the remote, derelict house. She has kept her inheritance secret. Refusing medication she slips into psychosis and believing she needs to protect her girls from the evil influences of the world she chains them inside the house so they will not be caught by THEM. Without medical help her depression and psychosis return and she is unable to cope. What will happen to the girls chained up in the house without food? Does anyone know they are there?
